name: Essence-mp
savepath: Miniature Charms have been added! There are now 94 little buddies you can collect! Miniature Charms can drop from any monster; the drop rates are 1 in 6000 (Normal), 1 in 4000 (Nightmare) and 1 in 2000 (Hell). Gift Boxes have retired from Gheeds shop and can no longer randomly drop. Cubing a gift box is no longer recommended. Act 1 Hirelings no longer approach enemies to attack them in melee range. Hirelings were reverted to 2.4 vanilla stats in order to fix act 2 mercs not activating their aura.
Message of the Week - From Momsdadjokes
To the person who stole my bed.... I won't rest until I find you.
